nodes.text: The Bazurkah Clan or Bazurkah family was a crime family of Dugs on Malastare. It was headed by Bazurkah as of 32 BBY. A rivalry developed between the Bazurkah Clan and the Ruhx family after the Ruhx "insulted" the Bazurkah. Each family placed bounties on the other. Jango Fett accepted bounties from both families and killed both Bazurkah and Bog'Ruhx.
